full_summary:
================================

### TSPS 1.7 Leadership Development Consultant - Level 3 (Senior) 

### Solicitation Number: 5000075047

**Announcement Details**

*   **Title** : TSPS 1.7 Leadership Development Consultant - Level 3 (Senior)
*   **Reference Number** : CB-589-77298763
*   **Publication Date** : July 19, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date** : August 6, 2024 at 14:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date** : September 3, 2024
*   **Expected Contract End Date** : September 2, 2025

### Tender Status

This bid was cancelled and will not be proceeding with the RFP process.

### Bid Description

**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Procurement Category**: SRV

The Government of Canada requires a consultant to provide leadership development services to executive employees at the Director and Director General levels within the Department of Environment and Climate Change Canada.

### Evaluation Criteria
The evaluation of responses to this request will be carried based on a combination of the following factors:
*   Quality of the services offered
*   Pricings
*  Bidder's expertise and relevant experience in providing similar services

### Attachment

The RFP document is available for download from [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/) website.

*   [English version](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tendernotice/42674/tsps\_1.7-leadership-consultant-5000075047.pdf)
*   [French version](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tendernotice/42674/tsps\_1.7-leadership-consultant-5000075047-fr\_0.pdf)

**Business Administration Services**

*   UNSPSC Code: 80160000
*   UNSPSC Description (English): Business administration services
*   UNSPSC Description (French): Services d'administration d'entreprise

### Distribution and Receiving

This bid will be made available on the [Canada Buys Website](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-notices). The bid must be submitted electronically. The electronic bid template is available on the buyandsell.gc.ca web site.
